attributes.action: put the use of cannabis to public vote.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goverment is there to govern.a democracy relies on the goverment to govern fairly.It is unfair that possibly 5 million people smoke cannabis regularly and their views are not heard.smaller minorities havedone better.its time for the country to vote.As a democracy.long live the queen.
